alert.note: Alert for Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 4:06AM MST until January 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM CREEPING SLOWLY OUT OF NORTHEASTERN COLORADO... .Snow will gradually diminish over the northeast corner of Colorado this morning. Conditions will improve in the Sterling and Akron areas by sunrise, with accumulating snow lingering in Julesburg and Holyoke for a few more hours. Winds gusting up to 40 mph will produce areas of drifting snow. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult due to heavy snowfall on roadways and drifting snow. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Consider delaying travel until conditions improve later this morning. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
